biography_text: HORN, Kendra, a Representative from Oklahoma; born in Chickasha, Grady County, Okla., June 9, 1976; B.A., University of Tulsa, Tulsa, Okla., 1998; J.D., Southern Methodist University, Dallas, Tex., 2001; lawyer, private practice; staff, United States Representative Brad Carson of Oklahoma, 2004-2005; nonprofit executive; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
